Yes, absolutely. Sometimes in our life, we just know, there are people who God brings together. Because He knows that when they meet, they'll find a friendship which lasts forever. “People destined to meet will do so, apparently by chance, at precisely the right moment.” ― Ralph Waldo Emerson

Yes. A few good friends are better than a large batch of fake ones. Strong friendship is reciprocal and is based on years of nurturing. Friendship is not based on status or how beautiful the person is. Good friends are hard to come by, make time for, and treasure them. Thank you.
